Reviews.Title: A Great Little Camera for the Cost with the Quality You Expect from a Nikon
Reviews.Author: Gordon Olivant
Reviews.Content: We purchased the Nikon Coolpix L620 on August 30, 2013 to replace our 2008 vintage Coolpix which was lost in a white water spill after 5 years of great pictures. Several days after receiving the L620 we headed off to Great Smokey Mountains National Park for a week of relaxation and pictures. Several hundred pictures later in a variety of compositions and lighting we return giving the L620 high marks.  Needless to say the 18MP images render a sharp crisp picture. We didn't buy this camera to take low rez pictures so all of ours were at full resolution. In non flash situations the camera was able to recycle in less than a second between independent pictures. When a flash was used, often as a fill flash which produced amazing results, there is a noticeable time between pictures approaching 2 seconds which was not a problem at all. The 14x zoom was great when taking wildlife pictures although the automatic settings resulted in a slower than desired shutter speed resulting in a few blurred images. Perhaps the most impressive result was the vibrancy of the colors, exceeding expectations for a camera of this size and price. Performance in low light and foggy situations was notably good.Now for the rational for the 4 rather than 5 stars. We purchased the L620 in part because it uses 2 AA batteries rather than rectangular customs. With our last camera on several occasions we found ourselves without a spare battery so the ready availability of AA's made dealing with the lesser battery life a reasonable compromise: carrying an extra set in our pocket is easy. In a variety of lighting situations ours averaged 73 pictures (again at max resolution and mixed flash) over the trip (Duracell NiMH 2450mAh). Not bad performance. What was surprising is the lack of warning that you were about to run dry. In our previous 2 Coolpix a warning appeared in the view finder several pictures prior to the battery running dry. With the 620L there was little warning and in two cases the batteries died with none at all (yes there is a little battery in the view finder but it is not at all precise).  For a company of Nikon's reputation this is a miss that needs correction.One suggestion, get a high capacity/quality memory card (we used a 32GB SanDisk Extreme) as it is worth cost for the capacity.All in all I would give the L620 a strong recommendation and look forward to years of use.

Reviews.Title: No low battery warning and eats batteries.
Reviews.Author: ✓Onoñdagegá

Reviews.Title: Experienced Exhausted Battery Issues 1st Day along with Horrible AF Delay
Reviews.Author: Gabrielle
Reviews.Content: This was a really disappointing purchase since I wanted a high quality P&S; camera to replace my 7 year old Kodak Easy Share. I had it for maybe 3 hours and took at the most 20 photos when the battery died on me. Thinking it was the brand new batteries I had just put in (yes, straight out of a package - not from the camera box) I replaced the battery to have the same thing happen again. It happened mostly when trying to record video and then would happen with snapping photos. While there may be some explanation for this (I tried using a different card - changed and checked all the battery and image quality settings, etc.) I was very aggrevated that it happened and it wasn't clear to me how to stop it from happening. Having the camera shut off after taking 5 photos - is not acceptable. I made the mistake of buying this without reading these reviews first. Another major issue is the horrible delay in the auto focus function. It take forever and I got so many blurry photos. In the end I returned the camera and am sticking with my 7 year old Kodak.  Really horrible product - such a surprise.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Bang for the Buck
Reviews.Author: John Tremain
Reviews.Content: This is a quite simple to use and quite capable camera for a great price. It takes very good pictures. As long as you have some sense of how cameras work--or are willing to learn--this camera will do it all. The optical zoom is superior, the ease of use of the controls is wonderful. This is Nikon quality--and they hit the ball out of the park with this one. Only someone who expects unrealistic things would be disappointed with this camera. I found it's abilities in low-light and other somewhat difficult environments to be surprisingly good. Very sharp photos with the 18.1 MP. And it serves as a very nice HD video camcorder as well! It is not too big--and not too small--and the feel and grip of it is just like you would want it to be. It downloads into your computer with ease. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Good general purpose camera - excellent for the average user
Reviews.Author: Roy Allen
Reviews.Content: I use a camera for work - I make house inspections.  This camera has everything I need plus more.  The quality of the photo and video is very good.  The quality is "real life".  My previous camera did not have such good quality.  As it is now, I don't even use the highest setting because I always download my photos into electronic storage and always lower the quality so it doesn't take up that much space.The camera is fast to take pictures.  however, on the highest quality setting the camera slows down.  It takes time to save the picture onto the memory card after each shot.  The highest setting takes the longest and lower settings are faster.  The flash is fast - it will go as fast as the pictures will.  So the speed is not affected by the flash.  It takes pictures at the same speed - whether the flash is up or not.The zoom is good, but not great.  I was hoping for a greater digital zoom.  It has a good one now - but my last camera was better, so I had higher hopes than I should have.All in all, the camera is light and economical and is very good for the average family user.  It uses AA batteries - which was my main requirement.  I travel all the time - AA batteries are mandatory for me.I would recommend this camera for anyone a good quality camera that takes high quality pictures.My only complaint is the zoom - but that was because my expectations.  The zoom is good as it is.  I was just disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Love my camera!
Reviews.Author: U_2
Reviews.Content: My Canon camera was a great camera but it wouldn't take pics really fast.  My brother told me the answer to this (get a larger SIM card), but it still would have fuzzy pics.  What turned me onto Nikon was seeing some pics my sister took with hers.  They were clear as a bell!!!  So far my new Nikon has not failed me!  BUT I do believe I will get a SIM card with more memory than the one recommended.  LOVE the red color, hard to lose!  :)  Highly recommend....

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camera
Reviews.Author: Mack Holbrook
Reviews.Content: This camera has all of the quality that has made Nikon the camera of choice for professionals world-wide.  The controls on the camera are fairly intuitive for a point and shoot camera.  It gives the operator the option of being involved with all of the options as they want to be.  You can have as much control as you desire over all of the different settings.  The camera takes wonderful photos and great 1080p video.  We have discovered that you can get more photos between battery changes if you use rechargeable batteries.  The camera is nice and compact and fits in the hand well for great shots.  I would highly recommend this camera to my friends.  Make sure to shop around for the best price.  I purchased mine from Amazon and the price was so good I feel like I stole it.

Reviews.Title: I have one now and am disappointed with the quality of pictures, brightness of video, and sturdiness
Reviews.Author: Pastor Rob
Reviews.Content: I have it propped up now letting the Gorilla superglue dry.  The pressure from the batteries against the battery door is strong making it a bit challenging to open and close, no problem, but it eventually took it's toll on the tiny plastic fold that holds the door shut and I've only had the camera for a few weeks (bought it Christ-mass eve).I needed to buy rechargeable batteries because the batteries that comes with it won't take video for long before it stops recording and says batteries exhausted.Forget taking sports pictures, baby pictures or anything that moves unless it's dark and you take it in low-light setting, otherwise it's just blurry regardless on the settings you choose. I've tried every setting and unless the subject sits still it's very hard to prevent the blur, especially when the flash is not in use.Using the flash decreases the blur considerably, but natural light is often more attractive in pictures.I'm very disappointed in Nikon for this camera, I expected a lot more for this name brand. They were like the Chevy of cameras, but not anymore with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and very good camera, I love it!
Reviews.Author: John Blayse
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera when I traveled in Singapore. This camera is really cheap and I satisfied with this. 18.1 MP CMOS is so enough for point and shoot. Beside when I move camera follow my daughter to take a shoot when she was walking, the image quality did not change. Interestingly, this camera has 14x zoom opt. It's a great ideal when take photo for landscape or in high building. As you can see, the design of this product is very good. This camera is the best idea for camera with 150$ budget.For more a bit expensive, you can buy another version of this with 30x zoom opt:B00B7N9CWGDont forget extra SD card:B003VNKNF0

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: This was the perfect camera for our trip to Mexico.  I wanted a better camera that would print great pictures. Easy to use and not bulky.

Reviews.Title: Worse camera ever
Reviews.Author: BBunny45
Reviews.Content: It eats through batteries when trying to do video. It takes forever to take a picture and to save it to take another. I even lowered the resolution and it was still taking for ever to take a photo.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Jeanne Root "Jeanne"
Reviews.Content: I had another Nikon for many years that was a much earlier model of this version.  It was the best camera I ever owned for just a basic camera that does a lot and took great pictures.  Not professional, but for a common person that wants to carry something on vacation trips, this works very good.  The new one is even better than my old version.  I wouldn't notice the difference in my pictures if it wasn't for my friend who is a professional photographer.  When I compare her pictures to mine, I see a difference.  But for the common person, this is excellent and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Relake
Reviews.Content: I am not a photographer so this is quite good enough for my purposes. It is easy to carry, looks sharp, easy to use, makes good pictures, zooms way in, transfers easily to my laptop, and has some nice software with it. The only drawback is that it is hungry for ordinary batteries. I ordered some rechargeable batteries which gives much longer use in the camera than the ordinary alkaline batteries. The price was great for a camera of this sort.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Harry
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with the 18.1 MP resolution.  On a small camera like this, this is great.  Also, to have a 14X zoom lens isn't common when buying a point and shoot camera.  This camera has most of the things you get when you buy an SLR, but without the bulk.If you are looking for a camera that can do it all.  This should be your choice.

Reviews.Title: Two major problems for me.
Reviews.Author: S. Sanders "raybug42"
Reviews.Content: First the card and battery compartment.  The batteries are not secured as in other Nikon cameras, therefore you have to force the cover down to  close it.  I am not sure how long the cover is going to hold up.Second is the flash, It does not pop up when needed, the camera tells you to raise the flash.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy, Great Product
Reviews.Author: Sethro
Reviews.Content: This Camera works perfectly. Great quality and sturdy design. The only down side is it takes an extra second to take numerous pictures one after another.

Reviews.Title: not a good experience with this camera
Reviews.Author: duke
Reviews.Content: I received this camera as a gift.  I do not know much about camera's but this one didn't even compare to my camera of 10 years. I used this one for about 20 minutes between two days took 15 pictures and 2 videos and it shut off due to batteries exhausted.  A few of the pictures turned out really blurry if there was any movement. I was not impressed with this camera. I returned it and got a canon powershot sx280 hs.  So far it takes better pictures and the battery life has been better. Thank you for all of you who submit reviews because I spent two hours learning about different camera's.

Reviews.Title: not good for dermatology photos
Reviews.Author: Adam C. Byrd
Reviews.Content: I am a dermatology resident and I like to take photos of skin conditions.I had a Canon point-and-shoot (can't recall the model number, but it was about $300 according to my wife) that leaves this thing in the dust. Unfortunately I lost it.On the "easy / auto" mode it takes forever to focus, and often it does not focus well at that. On the macro mode it is no better. Then (I guess due to smaller processor?) it takes longer to register the photo on the screen and save it in preparation for the next shot. The Canon camera would automatically adjust the photo horizontal vs vertical on the display when reviewing photos depending on how you are holding the camera (similar to the iphone) and this camera does not do that. Despite this camera's 18 mega pixels, photos don't look as clear -- even when taken on the higher quality settings. Finally, it requires 2 AA batteries and consumes them quickly -- keep an extra pair on hand!I wouldn't buy it again. I wish I had my canon back. This one will have to suffice for now......I hope that helps

Reviews.Title: Jam packed with options in a small body
Reviews.Author: Ryan G. Miller "Ryan"
Reviews.Content: We are upgrading from a Cannon Power Shot A570IS.  This product blows it out of the water though its an unfair comparison as the Cannon only is a 7.1 MP while this is 18.1 MP.PROS: A lot of filter options available to you and a couple of smart auto features.  I love the ability to use the Night vision mode to take some incredible night/dusk shots.  I was able to zoom in on the moon and set the filter to dark and earned myself some great pictures of the moons craters.  I wish I could upload the photo to show it.CONS: easy mode auto feature: when trying to take pictures of young ones that can't sit still, it will choose a slow shutter speed which always results in blurry kids.When pushing the button to take a picture half way to focus, it will sometimes take up to 2-5 seconds before the camera is ready to take a picture.  It will de-focus slowly and then re-focus.besides those to cons, I am completely satisfied with the camera and can live with the small setbacks.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera! - Nikon Website Really Good for Specs and Other In-Depth Reviews
Reviews.Author: ~J.
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera! I love the photos that it takes and the wonderful video quality. It works really well with a universal tripod. However, while most people love the fact that this camera takes AA batteries, I do not. They do not keep the camera running nearly as long as a Li-ion battery, which is what my other camera took. So, that is the only major drawback.I reviewed this WAY more in depth on the Nikon website, so if you wanted a full spec check and review from both Nikon and myself you could take a look there as well. On the Nikon website, they offer videos and pictures taken specifically by this camera so you can really see the usage examples well.Hope this information helps.

Reviews.Title: Good but not so good
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: 4 Stars -Well nothing is perfect.  Not real happy with the way the flash works on the camera.  Wait time for the flash to allow you to take a picture is way to long!!  People keep saying "come on take the picture !!"  it will not let you take a picture until the flash is charged. You say that is normal - but it is not charging until you hold the trigger down half way. You have to stand there ready to take the picture and wait - 15 to 25 seconds.  Bad !!!  Now outside and no flash pictures are great and fast.  Just thought after reading all the reviews on this camera - "all rated it great" -  that I wouldn't have a problem like this with this unit !!!!

Reviews.Title: So easy to use!
Reviews.Author: P. Berent
Reviews.Content: Not the smallest camera I have ever had, but lightweight enough to carry in my tote bag.  It has a 10 x zoom AND a wide angle adjustment.  I usually give up reading the instructions after the first couple of pages, but this one was useful and interesting and written in clear language with helpful illustrations.  Does more tha I expected!

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Jenna Hall
Reviews.Content: I found this camera very frustrating. I keep getting messages that the battery is run down after putting in new batteries twice. It is very difficult to get the battery compartment open and very difficult to get it closed with batteries inside.  I find the shutter speed very slow. I wish I would have purchased another camera. I bought it because I loved my first Nikon Coolpix, not this one. I will not purchase another.

Reviews.Title: Batteries!!!
Reviews.Author: Larry Santee
Reviews.Content: The camera is good for as long as you have 100 batteries.  If your like me who has 2 little ones we go thru a ton of batteries for toys, games, etc. the toys will last some hours of play time with the cheap batteries but in the camera it would die within one hour.  Since we bought Duracell batteries I have noticed it has lasted a few days.  I love the camera especially the features but the battery thing ruins it!!  (Recharchable batteries don't work...I tried)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Mr. Class Act
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to replace a very old digital camera. The features are amazing with a complete ease of use. If you want the modern features without the added complexity this camera is a must.

Reviews.Title: buy stock in batteries
Reviews.Author: jay
Reviews.Content: Worst camera I've ever purchased. Bought this camera to take on vacation and had to buy another one two days into the trip. Battery life is horrible.

Reviews.Title: Terrific camera for the dollar, dollar bill!!
Reviews.Author: Mary Anne Belanger "she who dances with eleph...
Reviews.Content: I switched from a Canon 10 MP to this Nikon Coolpix L620. It has great ratings but I was concerned about using it. NO worries to be had. This camera takes fantastic pics and it's easy to operate. Well worth the investment.

Reviews.Title: Cool Pix L620
Reviews.Author: Steve Friend
Reviews.Content: The color is red.  Cannot go wrong with that.  Nice pictures.  Have not taken our big camera out since we bought this.

Reviews.Title: GOOD CAMERA, GREAT PRICE
Reviews.Author: Ken Edwards
Reviews.Content: Paid about $40 less than retail and it's a great little camera with good resolution.  Can't go wrong with Nikon's these days.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with the value
Reviews.Author: Gumdrop
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the camera. I prefer the AA batteries system over rechargeable batteries for my needs. The price was competitve and I loved the availability of the red color choice .

Reviews.Title: amazing camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Peter Schimpf
Reviews.Content: Outstanding camera.  14x optical zoom for zoom in on distant pictures. Insane macro for closeups.  Works great in life light.  The only downside, battery life not great.  Overall, amazing value

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera!!
Reviews.Author: Chris Aldrighetti
Reviews.Content: Great low price, fast shipping, 14X zoom, 18.1 MP. Takes stunning images. Awesome macro setting. I am super glad I purchased this camera.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Terry D. Whisman "TerryDWhisman"
Reviews.Content: bought it because my old cannon was technologically outdated.  works great and makes all the decisions I do not or can not make as far as settings.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Jesus Resendiz Rodriguez "CHUYTIME"
Reviews.Content: It's a good producto, small but with good quality video and photo. I recomend to my friends and family  thank's

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: ernestine serna
Reviews.Content: User friendly, love the megapixels. Have to keep good quality batteries in it  for shutter speed and no blur. Have made great prints of my artwork with this little camera, good camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Nearly ideal pocket camera
Reviews.Author: shirley espenshade
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera with reasonable zoom and LOW LIGHT capabilities to carry in my handbag. I would have enjoyed a larger zoom, but it's low light capabilities are worth the trade off. Liked it so much, bought a 2nd one for my husband.

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: fdbruns
Reviews.Content: This camera has a lot of options and works very well in low light conditions. Really like the image stabilization feature.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: FaithHopeLove
Reviews.Content: I have been happy with the overall functioning and quality of pictures of this camera.  It has a lot of different options for picture taking...at times seems to be little difference but I am still tinkering with it and learning how to apply them.  My husband is dissatisfied with the reaction time between depressing of shutter button and capture of picture.  As said, good camera for the price.  Wasn't prepared to move up to the "next level" in cameras.

Reviews.Title: Like it.
Reviews.Author: Sheena Yang
Reviews.Content: The battery does die fast.  But it works great.  Only problem is you have to hold real still to NOT take a blurry picture.  Other than that, the pictures look great.  I rarely have to turn the flash on! -that part was impressive!

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX L620
Reviews.Author: dg
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and is just perfect for my needs.  The 14x Zoom Lens is excellent for zooming in at distant objects.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Romero
Reviews.Content: Great purchase.  Perfect gift for my wife. Much better than the older model that we had.  Easy to use and sharp pictures. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: It's alright.
Reviews.Author: rosaline rosario
Reviews.Content: Only drawback is the battery life. I put two brand new Duracell n by the end of day while on a trip I gave to replace the batteries. Make sure you always carry an extra set. Have lost a few good moments because battery was depleted.

Reviews.Title: Nice pocket camera.
Reviews.Author: jmksioo1
Reviews.Content: The reviews stating the battery consumption of this camera are dead on. I get battery low warnings immediately after starting up with brand new fresh rechargeables. You can ignore the warning for a few hours but then the camera starts to die and you need to change the batteries again. I love the motion blur and rapid picture taking capabiliity. Nice camera wish it was a little smaller so I can keep it in my pocket and not have to use the belt-purse holster.

Reviews.Title: Looking for a Camera?  Buy a Nikon Coolpix!
Reviews.Author: E. Jane Wilkins
Reviews.Content: I love my Coolpix camera; the pictures are sharp and clear.  It is easy to use, small and light weight.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jeff Leonard
Reviews.Content: My wife loves this camera. Her brother has one similar and she ordered this one because of that. It takes great pictures and is easy to carry and use.

Reviews.Title: Good quality in a compact size!
Reviews.Author: Dianne Lorraine Zimmerman
Reviews.Content: Nikon makes excellent cameras and I was not disappointed with this one.  I wanted quality in a compact digital camera. I love the zoom which is much better than my old digital camera.  The pictures are of high quality and the camera is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix L620 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: J. Palm "mommomx2"
Reviews.Content: I got this for my husband. It's a great little camera and easy to use. Also, it takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Yep
Reviews.Author: Selena
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera aside from the fact that it's battery life is REALLY, REALLY short! Listen to all of the reviews, I figured since people were saying it was short that it would last six hours or something along the lines of that but that is definitely not the case, it doesn't last very long at all, I haven't timed it, really, but I would say that the battery life is about three hours. My other complaint is that some of the images are blurred, as expected though. Other than that I like this camera very much, it does take some really great shots! I have not learned to use it very well yet so I'm hoping that the more I use it the better the pictures will turn out!

Reviews.Title: Great Price, Sub-Optimal Performance
Reviews.Author: Brett
Reviews.Content: Got this camera because of the redesigned size and weight.  Unfortunately the functionality did not meet my expectations.  Shutter speed was sub-par regardless of the settings (auto or manual).  Additionally, user will have to buy an Eye-fi compatible SD card in order to transfer pictures wireless.  Still takes a great photo but expected more.

Reviews.Title: Good for pocket carrying photography
Reviews.Author: Stephanie L Jones
Reviews.Content: I normally shoot with a DSLR 5100 which I had to send for servicing.  I had a cruise planned with no photo equipment.  The purchase of this camera was a last minute thought that produced some very nice memorable shots.  Now I take this camera when I am not in photographer mode.  I still get great results.

Reviews.Title: great for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Angie Hiland
Reviews.Content: This was a great price for a Nikkon. It met all of my daughters wishes. She is in love with her nee camera. The photos look great.

Reviews.Title: Nikon coolpix camera
Reviews.Author: Clark
Reviews.Content: Quality of pictures are excellent. Built in flash, but with the high megapixel rating , not required in most natural lighting. Easy to use. Never had a Nikon before, hopefully it lasts longer than my previous purchases of Kodak and Canon which crapped out for no known reason.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Isabel Ibarra
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera, the quality of the material and what not is great.I love how much it can zoom in and still be an image or video! Of great quality.It is a digital camera, so if anybody thought this is one of those professional looking camera which you can buy a lens for is not.I used it for my son's Christmas recital, and I absolutely loved how much I could zoom in and still get quality videos and pictures. Once you get the hang of how it works it's actually a great DIGITAL camera.

Reviews.Title: Nikon coolpix L620 review
Reviews.Author: Jim Moore
Reviews.Content: So far it has been totally satisfactory.  It is very easy to use, very portable and takes beautiful pictures.  Love the zoom.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Enrique F. Rife "KIKEKIKE"
Reviews.Content: fast camera, resistant, very nice pictures day and night, battery with a very good hours average, very good in general

Reviews.Title: Camera trouble not seen.
Reviews.Author: Frank Feltes
Reviews.Content: Self-adjusting focus did not work. Distance shots were blured. In cold weather camera stopped working under 60 degrees. No case with camera for protection of lens, all extra.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: JCBiker
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife and she really loves having this in her purse to capture those photos you never expect to want to take.  She really loves the quality of the photos, but really misses not having a view finder.  We think the Auto modes take just a bit too long to take a picture, so we miss some shots, but the action mode takes care of that.  I just can't seem to get the wife to use anything but auto.

Reviews.Title: Pictures clear, zoom great!
Reviews.Author: ANDJELKA RAPANT
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift to my niece in Europe. She loves it, but regrets that it cannot be charged off the computer. Still, it was her choice to purchase this one. It has a better reputation over there than most other cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great camera - smart!
Reviews.Author: Karen Perrine
Reviews.Content: One smart camera! My last camera had a mix of auto settings such as night portrait, landscape, etc. as well as manual settings, which was helpful. This camera (save for ability to set exposure) lacks the manual settings option - but it does NOT need them. It takes absolutely amazing shots in low light - even without flash and keeps the shutter open at just the right length - without having to manually adjust it. We took shots with the Canon DSLR and my new little Nikon, and the Nikon L620 was easily producing better pictures without no effort. I took a picture of my boyfriend standing in a dark hallway, no flash, and it took a great shot. You will love this camera if you want indoor shots during the day or night that look great. I tried the panorama feature, which is also quite nice, taking sweeping views of the house inside and out.

Reviews.Title: A really COOL camera
Reviews.Author: goldjr1
Reviews.Content: I've yet to find fault with any of the camera's functions. I cannot attest to battery life because the amount of 'kept' photos in relation to deleted ones makes it impossible to determine how many pictures can be actually taken. This camera has been well used in the past three months and each time you use it you learn more and more of it's available features.Dislikes: NONE

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: James Latimer
Reviews.Content: Very nice at a good price.. Takes great pictures and is easy to use. I would buy another nikon in the future.

Reviews.Title: nice quality
Reviews.Author: Ron Bonilla
Reviews.Content: Bought it to replace an older Samsung pocket camera and found out that this Nikon is a lot easier  to operate, great HD resolution for videos. For the price it is a great compact camera.

Reviews.Title: Best Camera Ever!
Reviews.Author: cbuchmann
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing, it takes very clear HD pics. It is the best camera I have ever purchased. I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Too Slow & Bad Quality
Reviews.Author: j-999
Reviews.Content: Not a great camera - too slow, does not take good pictures - bad low light cameraDont waste your money

Reviews.Title: worse that bad camera
Reviews.Author: mom
Reviews.Content: Worst camera ever! After a few moments of video recording batteries died. After a few days camera wouldn't turn on with fresh batteries.

ProductInfo.Features:
14x Zoom-NIKKOR glass lens and comfortable grip
Lens-shift VR image stabilization
18.1 megapixel BSI CMOS image sensor
Large, high resolution 3.0-inch display
Full HD (1080p) video in stereo
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX L620 18.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 14x Zoom Lens and Full 1080p HD Video (Red)
